thread.title: Fitzgerald & Co Appoints David Matathia As Chief Strategy Officer
thread.title_full: Fitzgerald & Co Appoints David Matathia As Chief Strategy Officer

title: Fitzgerald & Co Appoints David Matathia As Chief Strategy Officer
text:
Fitzgerald & Co Appoints David Matathia As Chief Strategy Officer Fitzgerald & Co 13 minutes ago ÓÅ± Content preferences Done 
ATLANTA, July 6, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Fitzgerald & Co today announced the appointment of David Matathia as Chief Strategy Officer. Matathia most recently served as Director of Marketing Communications for Hyundai Motor America leading the company's advertising, paid media and social media strategies. View photo . 
The appointment is the first senior leadership addition since Matt Woehrmann was appointed CEO in early June. 
"We have a growing client list and, under Noel Cottrell (Chief Creative Officer) dynamic, talked-about creative work. David adds outstanding strategy credentials to our team," said Woehrmann. "We are excited to have him in Atlanta as a partner to Noel and me to help drive great product across our creative and media offerings." 
Added Matathia, "There is infectious and irresistible energy and momentum at the agency. I'm looking forward to being part of Fitzgerald and the growing creative culture in Atlanta." 
Prior to leading award-winning work for Hyundai, Matathia worked at GSD&M advertising in Austin, Texas, where he served as senior vice president and chief strategist, working across the agency's client roster. He held senior strategic and account leadership roles for the BMW business in the U.S. and globally. 
Matathia started his career at TBWAChiatDay Amsterdam as a strategic planner on Nissan. He worked on the integrated brand team during the AOL Time Warner merger and worked in the Hispanic market with Univision to help oversee their first-ever branding effort to the U.S. Hispanic consumer. 
About Fitzgerald & Co Fitzgerald & Co is an award-winning, full-service agency specializing in advertising, digital, social, media planning and buying, and brand and marketing strategy. Fitzgerald & Co infuses logic and magic into every solution for its clients, including Coca-Cola, Carrabba's Italian Grill, MedExpress, Navy Federal Credit Union, Pergo Flooring, Quikrete and Synovus. Fitzgerald & Co is part of McCann Worldgroup, a division of Interpublic Group (NYSE: IPG). For more information, visit www.fitzco.com . To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/fitzgerald--co-appoints-david-matathia-as-chief-strategy-officer-300108995.html Professional Services
